definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

Han Han (1982-), PRC blogger, singer and professional rally driver

the spread of Korean cultural products (TV dramas, pop music etc) to other countries/Korean Wave

pinyin: Han2 guo2 Lian2 he2 Tong1 xun4 she4

definition: Hancheng city and county in Shaanxi
Han Xin (-196 BC), famous general of first Han emperor Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1]

sentences.english: The so-called security zone is in the buffer zone between South and North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的联安全地带，也就是在南北韩之间的缓冲地带。

sentences.english: King Sejong the initiative of the Han nationality's culture has been a qualitative leap.

sentences.chinese: 而更亲近的日韩关系，也将夯实日美同盟。

sentences.english: He also thanked China for sending the Buddha Finger Sarira of Famen Temple in Shanxi for enshrinement in the ROK.

definition: surname Wei/name of vassal state of Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States/Wei state, founded by Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1], one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty/the Wei dynasty 221-265/Wei prefecture and Wei county at different historical periods

pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
